Pre-Game Insights: The Orioles have won each of their last eight games against AL Central opponents that held a losing record.

Miscellaneous Highlights: The White Sox are averaging 3.04 runs while their pitching is giving up 5.15 runs per game.

The Orioles offense is ranked 4th in the league while the defense is ranked 13th.
